Class Tabs

Build out your application's tabs using this component. This is the parent of the Tab and TabHeader components.

See demo

Tabs expects a set of n-tab elements

<ibm-tabs>
    <ibm-tab heading='tab1'>
        tab 1 content
    </ibm-tab>
    <ibm-tab heading='tab1'>
        tab 2 content
    </ibm-tab>
    <!-- ... -->
    <ibm-tab heading='tab1'>
        tab n content
    </ibm-tab>
</ibm-tabs>

../../iframe.html?id=tabs--basic

Properties

ariaLabel

@Input()
ariaLabel: string
  • Defined in src/tabs/tabs.component.ts:96

Sets the aria label on the TabHeaders nav element.

ariaLabelledby

@Input()
ariaLabelledby: string
  • Defined in src/tabs/tabs.component.ts:100

Sets the aria labelledby on the TabHeaders nav element.

cacheActive

@Input()
cacheActive: boolean = false
  • Defined in src/tabs/tabs.component.ts:80

Set to 'true' to have Tab items cached and not reloaded on tab switching.

followFocus

@Input()
followFocus: boolean = true
  • Defined in src/tabs/tabs.component.ts:84

Set to 'true' to have tabs automatically activated and have their content displayed when they receive focus.

isNavigation

@Input()
isNavigation: boolean = false
  • Defined in src/tabs/tabs.component.ts:92

Set to true to have the tabIndex of the all tabpanels be -1.

position

@Input()
position: "top" | "bottom" = "top"
  • Defined in src/tabs/tabs.component.ts:76

Takes either the string value 'top' or 'bottom' to place TabHeader relative to the TabPanels.

skeleton

@Input()
skeleton: boolean = false
  • Defined in src/tabs/tabs.component.ts:88

Set to true to put tabs in a loading state.

tabHeaders

@ContentChild({"selector":"TabHeaders","opts":"{ static: false }"})
tabHeaders: any
  • Defined in src/tabs/tabs.component.ts:114

Content child of the projected header component

tabs

@ContentChildren({"selector":"Tab","opts":"{ descendants: false }"})
tabs: QueryList<Tab>
  • Defined in src/tabs/tabs.component.ts:109

Maintains a QueryList of the Tab elements and updates if Tabs are added or removed.

type

@Input()
type: "default" | "container" = "default"
  • Defined in src/tabs/tabs.component.ts:104

Sets the type of the TabHeaders
